CustomField.description: If checked, code will not mark the Requirement Response as Viewed. A user or Flow can mark the Requirement Response as Viewed and thus control if the Requirement is updated as Finished. This field and code was created for the O&R Placement Exam experience in Spring 2024.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, code will not mark the Requirement Response as Viewed. A user or Flow can mark the Requirement Response as Viewed and thus control if the Requirement is updated as Finished. This field and code was created for the O&R Placement Exam experience in Spring 2024.
CustomField.label: Do Not Mark Requirement as Viewed
